pathGuides.description: By applying bleed Status effects, it triggers frequent and sustained damage ticks. Additionally, by increasing its own damage multiplier, it can focus and eliminate targets faster. it also retains decent mobility.
High mobility and single-target control; excels at kiting enemies. Combine strong endurance with charged skills to unleash Burst Damage.
Boasts extreme mobility and rapid, consecutive attacks, with multiple ways to close the gap quickly. Has some control tools to maintain a safe damage-dealing environment.
A ranged playstyle, capable of sustained ranged DPS. Also has some control, allowing for burst combos with airborne attacks.

Equipped with shields, DMG Reduction and interruption resistance, it has strong survivability. It can also serve as the team's damage sponge via taunt abilities. Can group enemies and then use wide-range charged skills for AoE damage.

Features both burst and sustained healing, covering single-target and group recovery. Revive abilities allow defeated allies to rejoin the fight, while also providing team-wide damage buffs for support.

combinations.note: High skill ceiling (including animation canceling), Bleed is strong, High risk high reward
Very balanced, good Engage and Disengage, AOE and Control effects. Most balanced set, it is also the very first you get at the start. Viable throughout the game
High burst, high mobility, melting enemies but needs to hit the combos well
Tanks are needed, always. Consistent high dmg output with shields and CC immunity, no sweat build but hitting hard and surviving long
Only full heal build, lacks solo Damage but extremely important for any Multiplayer content. Parties will always look for full healers.
a lot of safety because you can always stay ranged and go in for a quick combo with Fan just to disengage again. Lacks damage, easy to parry in PvP

combinations.weapon1: My Fav. Offmeta Builds (2nd Weapon with Heal for Solo Content)

combinations.note: Stylish and a lot of Fun to play
Umbrella Ranged Stun into Engage
Umbrella Ranged Stun into Engage
Umbrella Ranged Stun into Engage
Stun with Nameless Spear, DPS with Mortal Rope Dart
Stun with Nameless Spear, DPS with Twin Blades
Helps you to Sustain through Solo Content, because Heal Pots are limited per Run, it will help you to stay alive p.e. in World Bosses. / Focused on Heal over Time
Helps you to Sustain through Solo Content, because Heal Pots are limited per Run, it will help you to stay alive p.e. in World Bosses. / Focused on Burst Heal
Insanely usefull combination, Nameless Sword has CC immunity + can interrupt, Spear to shock enemies, boost Defense and Knock them Over. in PVE, triple interrupt
Interrupt from the Nameless sword, insane Shield and CC from the Mo Blade, a disgustingly strong combination
Shock Enemies and boost your Defense with Spear and Knock them over > Strategic Sword for Burst DPS & Bleed
Consistent DPS with burst and Bleed combined with Shields and AOE CC
Shock Enemies and boost your Defense with Spear and Knock them over > Dual Blades into full DPS combo rotation
Insane Shield into full DPS rotation for insane Tankyness and still high DPS

internalArts.name: Morale Chant
internalArts.description: 80% chance to gain one stack of Yi River when attacking or healing: Increases Physical Damage and healing by 1% for 8 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. The chance to gain Yi River is only calculated once every 2 seconds.

internalArts.name: Sword Morph
internalArts.description: When Nameless Sword's Charged Skill, Vagrant Sword is charged while the Qi shield is present, it unleashes multiple additional sword energy attacks at the 2nd charging stage. You can consume bonus Endurance to increase the sword energy's damage; each Endurance increases damage by 1%, up to 20%.

internalArts.name: Mountain's Might
internalArts.description: Nameless Spear Martial Arts Skill Qiankun's Lock grants Endless Gale effect, increasing the Endurance cost reduction to 20% for 5 seconds.

internalArts.name: Battle Anthem
internalArts.description: Increases Charged Skills damage against all bosses by 10%

internalArts.name: Seasonal Edge
internalArts.description: After casting a Dual-Weapon Skill, gain one of the following effects: Heart of Four Season: Critical Rate +8% , Will of Four Seasons: Affinity Rate +4%, wound of Four Seasons: Physical DMG Bonus +8%, Sound of Four Seasons: All Attribute Attack Bonuses +8%

internalArts.name: Sword Horizon
internalArts.description: After casting Strategic Sword’s Martial Arts Skill, Special Skill, or Charged Skill, press the skill button at the perfect timing during the ending phase to cast Crisscrossing Swords and unleash follow-up attacks. If the target has 5 stacks of Bleed, remove all Bleed stacks and deal high Bleed damage once.

internalArts.name: Blossom Barrage
internalArts.description:
Vernal Umbrella's Martial Arts Skill Spring Sorrow can hold up to 2 stacks. Hitting a target applies the Combo effect: increases Damage taken from the caster's Ballistic Skills by 10% for 8s.
Affected Ballistic Skills include: Martial Arts Skill Let Spring Go, Special Skill Everbloom,

internalArts.name: Royal Remedy
internalArts.description: Increases the healing effect of the water clone created by Panacea Fan’s Martial Arts Skill, Cloudburst Healing by 10%. If you are within its range, gain 1 Dewdrop each time when receive healing over time.

internalArts.name: Exquisite Scenery
internalArts.description: Successfully defending with Thundercry Blade activates its special counterattack. Press Perception Skill or Heavy Attack to unleash a first stage Charged Heavy Attack without charging. This effect can only trigger once every 10 seconds. Hitting a target with a Varied Combo restores 1 bar of Battle Will (no more than 1 bar restored per cast).

internalArts.name: Echoes of Oblivion
internalArts.description: Infernal Twinblades’ normal Light Attacks apply Sin to enemies, while Light Attacks under Flamelash apply Karma. When attacking targets affected by Sin and Karma with Infernal Twinblades’ Light Attacks, ignore their 10% Physical Defense and 10% Bamboocut Resistance respectively.

internalArts.name: Envigorated Warrior
internalArts.description: Increases all damage and healing done by 5%. This effect is disabled for 5 seconds after being hit. Taking a hit also grants a Cage effect, increasing all damage taken by 5%.

internalArts.name: Bitter Seasons
internalArts.description: When dealing damage, there is a 10% chance to apply a Poison effect for 5 seconds, dealing damage once per second. The Poison reduces target’s Physical Defense by 0.6% for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (duration refreshed upon stacking).

internalArts.name: Vital Leech
internalArts.description: Casting an Exhaustion Execution Skill resotres HP equal to 8% of the damage delt.

internalArts.name: Fury Harvest
internalArts.description: Vitality is required to cast Mystic Arts. Certain recovery actions have a 50% chance to grant 1 bonus Vitality. No bonus Vitality is rewarded when you gain Vitality by attacking, taking a hit, or successfully deflecting an attack.

internalArts.name: Divine Roulette
internalArts.description:
Upon a successful deflection, gain one of the following effects:
 Immortal Guidance: Increases the next skill’s damage by 10%.
 Immortal Heart: The next skill is guaranteed to be Critical.
 Immortal Spirit: The next skill is guaranteed to be an Affinity hit.
The effect lasts 10 seconds and can only trigger once every 30 seconds.
It applies to Martial Art Skills, Perception Skills, Special Skills, Charged Skills, and Varied Combos.

internalArts.name: Evasive Charge
internalArts.description: After a Perfect Dodge, there is a 50% chance to refund 100% of Endurance consumed.

internalArts.name: Wildfire Spark
internalArts.description: Refunds 3,5% of the Endurance consumed.

internalArts.name: Wolfchaser's Art
internalArts.description: Reduces the required combo number to gain Heavenquaker Spear’s Martial Arts Skill, Sorrow Without Wine buff from 5/10 to 4/8. Each time Sorrow Without Wine hits a boss with Bleed effect from you, there is a 20%/40%/60%/80%/100% chance to increase the combo count by 1 based on the number of Bleed stacks.

internalArts.name: Adaptive Steel
internalArts.description:
Gain a Martial Skill effect based on the blade weapon you are using:
 Sword: 10% chance to apply one stack of Bleed to the target when dealing Affinity DMG.
 Spear: Attacks ignore 12.5% of target’s Physical Defense.
 Dual Blades: After a Perfect Dodge, increases the next Martial Arts Skill damage within 8 seconds by 25%.
 Mo Blade: Increases the Critical DMG of Charged Skills and Parry Counter Skills by 20%.
The Martial Skill of Sword has a 10-second cooldown, while Dual Blades’ Martial Skill has a cooldown of 25 seconds.

internalArts.name: Insightful Strike
internalArts.description:
Dealing Affinity DMG generates Focus. When Focus is full, enter the Concentration state for 10 seconds.
Concentration: Increases Affinity DMG by 10%. Upon hit, there is a 5% chance to reduce damage taken by 40%.

internalArts.name: Flying Gourds
internalArts.description: Grants 2 charges to Inkwell Fan's Peak's Springless Silence, but increases its cooldown by 3 seconds.

internalArts.name: Thunderous Bloom
internalArts.description: When you move more than 15m within 3 seconds, gain Spring Thunder: The next 3 Heavy Attacks or Airborne Heavy Attacks within 12 seconds gain 15% DMG Bonus. This effect may trigger once per 15 seconds.

internalArts.name: Star Reacher
internalArts.description: Gain 10% Physical Attack bonus for 8 seconds after knocking an enemy airborne.

internalArts.name: Restoring Blossom
internalArts.description: Dealing Critical Healing applies one stack of Nurturing for 3 seconds, increasing healing received by 2%, stacking up to 3 times.

internalArts.name: Esoteric Revival
internalArts.description: Increases the healing of Panacea Fan's Perception Skill, Resurrection, by 50% on revived target.

internalArts.name: Mending Loom
internalArts.description: Casting Soulshade Umbrella’s Special Skill, Echoing Grow restores 5 Dewdrops and additionally heals 10% of your Max HP for every 100 Dewdrops consumed.

internalArts.name: Trapped Beast
internalArts.description: Taking damage while HP is below 30% triggers Cornered Beast, generating a shield that absorbs up to 30% of Max HP. This effect lasts 4 seconds and can trigger once every 300 seconds.

internalArts.name: Art of Resistance
internalArts.description: Increases the duration of your own HP shield and the bonus effects of its source skill by 4 seconds.

internalArts.name: Rock Solid
internalArts.description: Increases the DMG Reduction of Stormbreaker Spear’s Roar of Storm by 20% after taunting a boss unit, and by 5% after taunting a non-boss unit, up to 20% in total. While the DMG Reduction is active, reduces all damage dealt by 10%.

internalArts.name: Vendetta
internalArts.description: Guided Blade's Vendetta Token lasts 5 seconds longer and restores 20 Token of Gratitudes.

internalArts.name: Breaking Point
internalArts.description: Hitting Exhausted enemies with a Critical Hit applies a stack of Disintegration for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Each stack grants 10 Physical Penetration and increases Critical DMG Bonus by 5%

internalArts.name: Riptide Reflex
internalArts.description:
Hitting an Enemy with a Control Skill reduces the Cooldown of the current Martial Arts Skill by 1s. This effect can only trigger once every 10s.
Affected Control Skills include: Bladebound Thread, Coiled Dragon, Qiankun's Lock, Spring Sorrow, Moon Shatter Spring, Wayfarer's Drift, Peak's Springless Silence.

internalArts.name: Wind Beneath Wings
internalArts.description: Reduces the Endurance cost of Movement Mystic Arts [Skywalk Dash]’s dash while jumping by 10%. After landing, increases Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds. Restores bonus HP (1% Max HP +1,000) after defeating any enemy.

internalArts.name: Evening Snow
internalArts.description: Within 12 seconds upon entering combat, if HP falls below 60%, gain Snow Vision for 4 seconds, restoring 2% HP +600 HP per second. This effect can trigger once every 300 seconds.

internalArts.name: Steadfast Stance
internalArts.description: Less ligely to suffer stagger effect when attacked. Invalid when the attack comes from a boss or player.

internalArts.name: Shadow Assault
internalArts.description: Increases the max range of Assassin Mystic Art [Touch of Death]'s ambush by 1.5m and the damage dealt by 10%. After a successful ambush, restores HP equal to 5% of the damage dealt.

internalArts.name: Fivefold Bleed
internalArts.description: Dealing damage has a 10% chance to apply one stack of Weeping Blood for 5 seconds, damaging the target once per second (up to 5 stacks, duration refreshed upon stacking). At 5 stacks, Weeping Blood will be removed from the target and deal piercing damage once.
